Posts.Content: Just learnt I have Brca2 gene and will be seeing the breast team once the genetics team have finished with me and I just don't know what is ahead of me or what to expect. All this is doing my head in and I am finding it so hard to sleep or think straight it's all the not knowing and if I have passed it on to my children. xxx
Posts.Title: just starting with the breast team.

Posts.Content: Thank you Karen.                                  Yes it is me that has the brca and I will try and get in to see the nurse at the doctors, hopefully they will not be to busy. x
Posts.Title: should I get my breast checked
should I get my breast checked
just starting with the breast team.

Posts.Content: for the pass few weeks I have had Itchy skin under my armpit at the side of my left breast, for the past few days my breast has hurt and painful if I sleep on my tummy or couch even just sitting and touching it also my nipple at the bottom seams a different pink  never noticed before, the top of my breast seems wider. I am unsure if to get checked or am I just worrying because I  have been informed about brca2 not had a mammogram, just worried that the dr will think it's all in my head. I think it is prob in my head.                                               thank you                                                              Shelley.
Posts.Title: should I get my breast checked

Posts.Content: No lumps so told to take pain killers and keep an eye on it , thank you ladies x
Posts.Title: should I get my breast checked

Posts.Content: O thank you misty, up early taking pain killers, I just feel like I am over reacting and being a pain, I will go back if it does keep hurting just hate the thought of them thinking I am wasting their time x
Posts.Title: should I get my breast checked

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies I will see if it still hurts over the weekend and if it does then I will go back next week, yes I did say about the changes but she said everything looked fine and the nipple was ok, taking the pain killers and they are working a little bit, but again thank you. xx
